command404: It seems that this command doesn't exist in the bot... Please report it to the DraftBot's staff
dmHelpMessage:
<:draftbot:529305485963427840> **What is this bot? How to play?**

A quick presentation of the bot is available here: https://draftbot.com
A complete guide to discovering the bot is available here: https://guide.draftbot.com

{emote:other.incoming} **How to add the bot to my server?**
The link to add the bot to your server is available on the bot's server. https://discord.gg/5JqrMtZ

{emote:effects.dead} **I just died, the bot told me to do {command:respawn}...**

Commands do not work in private messages. Run this command on a server where the bot can talk.

{emote:messages.description} **I'm looking for the list of commands.**

The list of commands is available by running the command {command:help} in a channel where the bot can talk.

{emote:collectors.question} **I have another question.**

Join the bot's Discord server and ask your question. Our staff will be delighted to help you!
dmHelpMessageTitle: Here are some information that could help you.
joinGuild: **{emote:other.incoming} Discord server joined :** `{{guild}}` | {emote:userKind.human} : `{{humans, number}}` | {emote:userKind.robot} : `{{robots, number}}` | Ratio bot/Human : `{{ratio, number}}` % | Validation : {{validation}}
leaveGuild: **{emote:other.outgoing} Discord server left :** `{{guild}}` | {emote:userKind.human} : `{{humans, number}}` | {emote:userKind.robot} : `{{robots, number}}` | Ratio bot/Human : `{{ratio, number}}` % | Validation : {{validation}}
maintenance:
DraftBot is currently under maintenance. For more information, here are different links:

{emote:networks.website} https://status.draftbot.com
{emote:networks.discord} https://discord.gg/5JqrMtZ
mentionHelp:
{emote:languages.en} Hello !

{emote:other.right} Following a change made by Discord, you must use "slash commands" to interact with DraftBot. Use the prefix `/` followed by the name of the command you wish to use.

{emote:other.why} Don't know where to start? Use {command:help} !

{emote:languages.fr} You speak French? Change the language with {command:language}

If you need help, don't hesitate to contact the support server: https://discord.gg/5JqrMtZ
noChannelAccess:
{emote:other.look}  | Hello! You're receiving this message because you tried to use one of my commands in a room where I have no permissions!**

Your request has been cancelled. To solve this problem, please send a message to the owner of the server on which you tried to use me. If you still can't solve the problem, please join the bot's support Discord at https://discord.gg/5JqrMtZ !
noEmbedPermission:
{emote:other.paperclip}  | Hello! You're receiving this message because you tried to use one of my commands in a room where I have permission to view messages, but not to embed links (Embeds)!**

Your request has therefore been cancelled. To solve this problem, please send a message to the owner of the server on which you tried to use me. If you still can't solve the problem, please join the bot support Discord at https://discord.gg/5JqrMtZ !
noFilePermission:
{emote:other.folder}  | Hello! You're receiving this message because you tried to use one of my commands in a room where I have permission to view messages, but not to attach files!**

Your request has therefore been cancelled. To solve this problem, please send a message to the owner of the server on which you tried to use me. If you still can't solve the problem, please join the bot support Discord at https://discord.gg/5JqrMtZ !
noReacPermission:
{emote:collectors.refuse}  | Hello! You're receiving this message because you tried to use one of my commands in a room where I have permission to view messages, but not to post reactions!**

Your request has therefore been cancelled. To solve this problem, please send a message to the owner of the server on which you tried to use me. If you still can't solve the problem, please join the bot support Discord at https://discord.gg/5JqrMtZ !
noSpeakInThreadPermission:
{emote:other.cantSpeak}  | Hello! You are receiving this message because you have tried to use one of my commands in a thread where I have permission to view messages, but not to send them!**

Your request has therefore been cancelled. To solve this problem, please send a message to the owner of the server on which you tried to use me. If you still can't solve the problem, please join the bot's support Discord at https://discord.gg/5JqrMtZ !
noSpeakPermission:
{emote:other.cantSpeak}  | Hello! You're receiving this message because you tried to use one of my commands in a room where I have permission to view messages, but not to send them!**

Your request has therefore been cancelled. To solve this problem, please send a message to the owner of the server on which you tried to use me. If you still can't solve the problem, please join the bot's support Discord at https://discord.gg/5JqrMtZ !
resetIsNow: {emote:announcements.trophy} The weekly ranking is currently being reset. The winner will soon be announced on the bot's server! The game will resume in less than 5 minutes!
seasonEndAnnouncement: {emote:unitValues.glory} **The fighting season is over! The winner is:** {{mention}}
seasonEndAnnouncementNoWinner: {emote:unitValues.glory} **The fighting season is over! Unfortunately, there are no participants and therefore winner this season.**
seasonEndIsNow: {emote:unitValues.glory} The fighting season is being reset! The winner will be announced shortly on the bot's server! The game will resume in less than 20 minutes!
serverList: **{emote:other.outgoing} Server {{count}} :** `{{guild}}` | {emote:userKind.human} `{{humans, number}}` {emote:userKind.robot} : `{{robots, number}}` | Ratio bot/Human : `{{ratio, number}}` % | Validation : {{validation}}
topWeekAnnouncement: {emote:announcements.trophy} **The weekly ranking has ended! The winner is:** {{mention}}
topWeekAnnouncementNoWinner: {emote:announcements.trophy} **This week's ranking is over! Unfortunately, there is no participant and therefore a winner this week.**
notificationFooter: You are receiving this message because notifications are active. To change this setting, use the command /notifications
notificationsNoChannelAccess: {emote:messages.refuse} It seems that the bot no longer has access to your notification room, notifications will now be in private messages. To change the notification mode, please run the {command:notifications} command.
notificationGuildDaily:
**{{pseudo}}** has received your guild's daily bonus:

{{rewards}}

notificationGuildStatusChange.becomeElder: You've been promoted to senior member of the{{guildName}}guild.
notificationGuildStatusChange.becomeMember: You have been demoted from the position of senior member of the{{guildName}}guild.
notificationGuildStatusChange.becomeChief: You have become the head of the{{guildName}}guild.

notificationEnergyFull: You've got all your energy back.
notificationPetExpedition: {{petDisplay}} is back from his expedition and may have brought back some treasures!
christmasBonusPreAnnouncement:
{emote:announcements.christmas} **Christmas Bonus Coming Soon!** {emote:announcements.christmas}

In a few hours, all players will receive a special gift: their token supply will be fully replenished! Enjoy this festive season!
christmasBonusApplied:
{emote:announcements.christmas} **Merry Christmas** {emote:announcements.gift}

Santa has come! Your stock of tokens has been filled to capacity. Take advantage of this gift to go on an adventure!
blessingAnnouncement_one:
{emote:smallEvents.altar} **Blessing activated: {{blessingName}} !**

Thanks to the generosity of **{{playerName}}**, a blessing has been invoked for all adventurers!

{emote:blessingCommand.active} **Effect:** {{blessingEffect}}
{emote:blessingCommand.timeLeft} **Duration:** {{durationHours}} hours

{emote:blessingCommand.topContributor} **Largest contributor:** {{topContributorName}} ({{topContributorAmount, number}} {emote:unitValues.money})
{emote:blessingCommand.contributors} **{{count}}** adventurer contributed to this blessing.
blessingAnnouncement_other:
{emote:smallEvents.altar} **Blessing activated: {{blessingName}} !**

Thanks to the generosity of **{{playerName}}**, a blessing has been invoked for all adventurers!

{emote:blessingCommand.active} **Effect:** {{blessingEffect}}
{emote:blessingCommand.timeLeft} **Duration:** {{durationHours}} hours

{emote:blessingCommand.topContributor} **Largest contributor:** {{topContributorName}} ({{topContributorAmount, number}} {emote:unitValues.money})
{emote:blessingCommand.contributors} **{{count}}** adventurers have contributed to this blessing.

blessingEffects.1: Rage gained in combat is doubled for all players.
blessingEffects.2: Combat rewards (money and points) are multiplied by 4 (excluding glory).
blessingEffects.4: All cash earnings are increased by 10%.
blessingEffects.5: All score gains are increased by 20%.
blessingEffects.6: Love points earned by pets are doubled.
blessingEffects.7: The effectiveness of healing potions is doubled.
blessingEffects.8: Pet expeditions earn a bonus token.

supportMessage:
{{langFlag}} If you need help, select your language using the buttons below. If you don't need help, ignore this message.
{emote:collectors.warning} **Every message sent here can be read by a human!**
commandDisabledInDM:
{{langFlag}} Hello, commands are disabled in private messages. Please go to a server to play!
If you would like help, click the button corresponding to your language below.

accountDeletion.confirmPrompt:
{emote:collectors.warning} **WARNING: This action is IMMEDIATE and PERMANENT. **

Your account will be anonymized and all your personal data will be deleted. This action is irreversible.

To confirm, type exactly the following phrase:
`{{phrase}}`
accountDeletion.success: {emote:collectors.accept} Your account has been successfully anonymized. All your personal data has been deleted. This action is irreversible.
accountDeletion.error: {emote:collectors.refuse} An error has occurred while anonymizing your account. Please contact support.
accountDeletion.cancelled: {emote:collectors.refuse} The deletion has been cancelled. If you wish to start again, please use the deletion code provided.
accountDeletion.invalidCode: {emote:collectors.refuse} The deletion code is invalid or has expired. Please contact support to obtain a new code.
accountDeletion.userNotFound: {emote:collectors.refuse} No account is associated with your Discord login.
accountDeletion.rateLimited: {emote:collectors.refuse} Too many incorrect attempts. Please try again in 15 minutes.
